snippet.title: Murder charge over Sunshine death
snippet.content: A MAN has been charged following the death of a man in Sunshine West on Saturday. A 44-year-old Sunshine West man died at a house on McGregor Court just after 8.30pm. Laura Chan, 42, who was also present was taken to hospital with non-life threatening injuries. The 45-year-old Sunshine West man has been charged with one count of murder. He faced an out of session's court hearing and was remanded to appear at the Melbourne Magistrates' Court later today.
